guwan yanaya palaka madiriye sambandhatha darshakayan gen maki giye aluyama 01:20 ta pamana bawayi satahan wi thibenne.mema yanayata sidu wuye kumakda yanna pilibandawa anumana kala haki thorathuru siyalla thawamath mayawakwa pawathina athara sidu wiya haki yayi anumana kala haki hethun athara yanaya pahara ganimakata lakwima ,yam pudgalayek ho pirisak athin winashayata pathwima, eseth nathinam yanaya abhyantharaye wayu pidanaya adu wima hethuwen karya mandalaya ha magin muhuna dun dushkara thathwaya aadi ansha kerehiyi awadhanaya yomu wemin pawathinne.redar palanayakese wuwada, thawamath yanayata ayath sunbun ho wenath kisiwak hamu wi nathi bawin piriksim katayuthu mulumaninma pahe yanaye gaman pathaye awasan hasirim wetha yomu wi atha.mewani thathwayak yatathe athurudahan wu guwan yanayak soyaganne kelesada?

mewata aachara dharma awashya kere.
habayi, atham deshiya samagamwala nayakayange thirana, thindu wenne lokkage oluwata watena ‘kelam padanam karagena.
me siyalu wancha dushana akramikatha sadaha awasanaye badu gewamin sitinne merata purawasiyan ya.
apita puluwan karala pennanna piyawaren piyawara kohomada dath madinne kiyala.
kisi dina hasu nowe yayi sitha dushana saha wancha kirimata kawareku ho dewarak sithanu atha.
palath sabha aliya thawa thawath sudu kirimata mudal nasthi karana bawa ratata helidaraw wuna.

adu aadayamlabhi pawulwala jiwana thaththwaya nangasituwamin yahapath hetak nirmanaya kirima udesa aarambha kala "diwi nanguma sahana aruna" wishesha naya yojana kramaya haraha palamu dina deke di prathilabhin 50,132 deneku wenuwen nikuth kala naya pramanaya rupiyal miliyana 740k (laksha 7,400) bawa rajaya prakasha karayi.dilidu bawa thuran karamin janathawa sawibala ganwima wenuwen jiwanopaya sanwardhana wyapruthi kriyathmaka kirima sandaha "asuru sanin athata mudal" yana themawa yatathe arambai me naya yojana kramaya pradeshiya lekam kottasa 327ka pihiti gramasewa wasam 14,022kata ayath gammana 35,440ka jiwathwana diwi nanguma jathika wadasatahane prathilabhi pawul 2,710,000k wenuwen kriyathmaka kara thibe.apakaruwan nomathiwa warshikawa siyayata 4ka wishesha sahanadayi poli anupathayak yatathe rupiyal 5000 sita rupiyal 50,000k dakwa uparimayakata yatathwa naya laba dena athara rata pura pihiti 1,073k wana diwi nanguma prajamula banku mangin ema naya mudal nikuth karayi.mahinda chinthana idiri dakma anuwa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage upades paridi mema wadasatahana magin prathilabhin wetha swayan rakiya aarambha kirima menma owunge anekuth awashyatha wenuwen sahana poli padanama matha naya labadima sidukere.diwi nanguma sanwardhana departhamenthuwa pihituwime pradhana aramunak wu dilidu bawa thuran kirima sandaha janathawa sawibala ganwimata jiwanopaya sanwardhana wyapruthi kriyathmaka kere.
